scripts.test: npm run test:setup && npm run test:standard
scripts.test:standard: TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node unit-test/index.ts
scripts.test:setup: CARGO_TARGET_DIR=../target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && hc dna pack .. -o ../syn.dna && hc app pack .. -o ../syn.happ
scripts.test:lib: npm run test:setup && npm run build:client && npm run build:lib && TRYORAMA_LOG_LEVEL=info RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRYORAMA_HOLOCHAIN_PATH="holochain" node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node syn-lib/index.ts
